name: DeleteWebinarChatMessage
description:
Delete a message from a live Zoom webinar by ID.

Use this tool to remove a specific message from an ongoing Zoom webinar chat by providing the message ID. Ensure that DLP for in-meeting chat is enabled and the necessary OAuth scopes are granted before calling this tool.

parameters.name: webinar_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the webinar from which to delete the chat message. This should be an integer.

parameters.name: webinar_chat_message_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the webinar chat message to delete, encoded in base64 format.

value_schema.description: The live webinar chat message's unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format.

parameters.name: webinar_chat_file_uuids
parameters.description: Comma-separated base64-encoded UUIDs for the live webinar chat files to identify specific chat data files.

value_schema.description: The live webinar chat file's universally unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format. Separate multiple values with commas.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: file_ids
parameters.description: The live webinar chat file's universally unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format. Separate multiple values with commas.

value_schema.description: The live webinar chat file's universally unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format. Separate multiple values with commas.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The live webinar chat message's unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format.

value_schema.description: The live webinar chat message's unique identifier (UUID), in base64-encoded format.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
